info.name: Bedelia API
info.description:
REST API for Bedelia Course Management System

This collection provides read-only access to:
- Carreras (Academic Programs)
- Materias (Subjects/Courses)
- Planes de Estudio (Study Plans)
- Planes-Materias (Plan-Subject relationships)
- Unidades Aprobables (Approvable Units)
- Requisitos Nodos (Requirement Nodes)
- Requisitos Items (Requirement Items)

All endpoints support filtering, searching, and ordering. Pagination is enabled with a default page size of 50 items.

query.description: Order by: nombre, fecha_creacion (prefix with - for descending)

request.description:
List all carreras (academic programs).

**Query Parameters:**
- `search`: Search by carrera nombre
- `ordering`: Order results by 'nombre' or 'fecha_creacion' (prefix with '-' for descending)
- `page`: Page number for pagination (default page size: 50)

**Example:**
- `GET /api/carreras/?search=INGENIERIA&ordering=nombre`

Retrieve a specific carrera by its UUID.

**Path Parameters:**
- `id`: UUID of the carrera

**Example:**
- `GET /api/carreras/123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000/`

query.description: Order by: codigo, nombre, creditos, fecha_creacion

request.description:
List all materias (subjects/courses).

**Query Parameters:**
- `codigo`: Filter by exact materia codigo
- `activo`: Filter by active status (true/false)
- `search`: Search by codigo or nombre
- `ordering`: Order results by 'codigo', 'nombre', 'creditos', or 'fecha_creacion' (prefix with '-' for descending)
- `page`: Page number for pagination

**Examples:**
- `GET /api/materias/?activo=true` - Get only active materias
- `GET /api/materias/?search=PROGRAMACION&ordering=nombre` - Search and order by nombre

Retrieve a specific materia with detailed information including unidades and planes count.

**Path Parameters:**
- `id`: UUID of the materia

**Response includes:**
- Basic materia information
- List of unidades aprobables
- Count of plans that include this materia

**Example:**
- `GET /api/materias/123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000/`

item.name: Planes de Estudio

query.description: Search by carrera nombre, anio, or descripcion

request.description:
List all planes de estudio (study plans).

**Query Parameters:**
- `carrera`: Filter by carrera UUID
- `anio`: Filter by plan year
- `activo`: Filter by active status (true/false)
- `search`: Search by carrera nombre, anio, or descripcion
- `ordering`: Order results by 'anio' or 'fecha_creacion' (prefix with '-' for descending)
- `page`: Page number for pagination

**Examples:**
- `GET /api/planes-estudio/?carrera=<uuid>&activo=true` - Get active plans for a carrera
- `GET /api/planes-estudio/?anio=2021` - Get plans for a specific year

item.name: Get Plan de Estudio by ID

variable.description: UUID of the plan de estudio

request.description:
Retrieve a specific plan de estudio by its UUID.

**Path Parameters:**
- `id`: UUID of the plan de estudio

**Example:**
- `GET /api/planes-estudio/123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000/`

item.description: Endpoints for managing planes de estudio (study plans)

query.description: Search by carrera nombre, plan anio, materia codigo, or materia nombre

request.description:
List all plan-materia relationships.

**Query Parameters:**
- `plan`: Filter by plan UUID
- `materia`: Filter by materia UUID
- `obligatorio`: Filter by obligatorio status (true/false)
- `search`: Search by carrera nombre, plan anio, materia codigo, or materia nombre
- `ordering`: Order results by 'semestre_sugerido' or 'fecha_creacion' (prefix with '-' for descending)
- `page`: Page number for pagination

**Examples:**
- `GET /api/planes-materias/?plan=<uuid>` - Get all materias in a specific plan
- `GET /api/planes-materias/?materia=<uuid>` - Get all plans that include a specific materia

request.description:
Retrieve a specific plan-materia relationship by its UUID.

**Path Parameters:**
- `id`: UUID of the plan-materia relationship

**Example:**
- `GET /api/planes-materias/123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000/`

item.name: Unidades Aprobables

query.description: Filter by tipo: CURSO, EXAMEN, UCB, OTRO
Search by materia codigo, materia nombre, codigo_bedelias, or nombre

request.description:
List all unidades aprobables (approvable units: courses, exams, UCB modules, etc.).

**Query Parameters:**
- `materia`: Filter by materia UUID
- `tipo`: Filter by tipo (CURSO, EXAMEN, UCB, OTRO)
- `activo`: Filter by active status (true/false)
- `search`: Search by materia codigo, materia nombre, codigo_bedelias, or nombre
- `ordering`: Order results by 'materia__codigo', 'tipo', or 'fecha_creacion' (prefix with '-' for descending)
- `page`: Page number for pagination

**Examples:**
- `GET /api/unidades-aprobables/?materia=<uuid>&tipo=CURSO` - Get curso unidades for a materia
- `GET /api/unidades-aprobables/?activo=true` - Get only active unidades

Retrieve a specific unidad aprobable by its UUID.

**Path Parameters:**
- `id`: UUID of the unidad aprobable

**Example:**
- `GET /api/unidades-aprobables/123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000/`

item.description: Endpoints for managing unidades aprobables (approvable units)

item.name: Requisitos Nodos

query.description: Filter by tipo: ALL, ANY, NOT, LEAF
Filter to show only root nodes (true/false)

request.description:
List all requisitos nodos (requirement nodes).

**Query Parameters:**
- `plan_materia`: Filter by plan_materia UUID
- `tipo`: Filter by tipo (ALL, ANY, NOT, LEAF)
- `padre`: Filter by padre UUID
- `root_only`: Filter to show only root nodes (true/false)
- `search`: Search by descripcion
- `ordering`: Order results by 'orden' or 'fecha_creacion' (prefix with '-' for descending)
- `page`: Page number for pagination

**Examples:**
- `GET /api/requisitos-nodos/?plan_materia=<uuid>` - Get all requisitos for a plan-materia
- `GET /api/requisitos-nodos/?root_only=true` - Get only root nodes
- `GET /api/requisitos-nodos/?tipo=LEAF` - Get only leaf nodes

Retrieve a specific requisito nodo by its UUID.

**Path Parameters:**
- `id`: UUID of the requisito nodo

**Query Parameters:**
- `tree`: Set to 'true' to return the full recursive tree structure with hijos and items

**Examples:**
- `GET /api/requisitos-nodos/123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000/` - Get basic nodo info
- `GET /api/requisitos-nodos/123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000/?tree=true` - Get full tree structure

item.description: Endpoints for managing requisitos nodos (requirement nodes)

item.name: Requisitos Items

query.description: Filter by tipo: UNIDAD, CREDITOS, TEXTO

request.description:
List all requisitos items (requirement items).

**Query Parameters:**
- `nodo`: Filter by nodo UUID
- `tipo`: Filter by tipo (UNIDAD, CREDITOS, TEXTO)
- `search`: Search by texto
- `ordering`: Order results by 'orden' or 'fecha_creacion' (prefix with '-' for descending)
- `page`: Page number for pagination

**Examples:**
- `GET /api/requisitos-items/?nodo=<uuid>` - Get all items for a specific nodo
- `GET /api/requisitos-items/?tipo=UNIDAD` - Get only UNIDAD type items

request.description:
Retrieve a specific requisito item by its UUID.

**Path Parameters:**
- `id`: UUID of the requisito item

**Example:**
- `GET /api/requisitos-items/123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000/`

item.description: Endpoints for managing requisitos items (requirement items)
